short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small button for AliExpress.com will provide you convenient access to the different parts of the store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small but convenient button that will help you to work with AliExpress.com more effectively. You can search any interesting items on the site or quickly navigate directly to the necessary page.
